    • About Kristy Moore


    Local Expert Realty is a top producing real estate team in the metro DC area run by Broker and Founder, Kristy Moore. Prior to founding this innovative company she founded Moore Realty Services and grew it to a top producing real estate team in the metro DC area winning an award in 2015 for the Best Teams in America. Local Expert Realty’s philosophy is that ‘Performance Beats Promises’. Our statistics consistently outperform other agents in our marketplace. We get our sellers more money and our buyers better deals than any other team in the area. Our team of Realtors, marketing and lead specialists, contract administrators, and closing coordinators ensures every client receives top notch service every time. Call us today to find out how you can “Experience the Difference”.
